intro: Urelytrum agropyroides, commonly known as the slender grassvetch, is a flowering plant species belonging to the family Poaceae. It is a small annual herb that typically grows in disturbed soils and open habitats. The plant has narrow, grass-like leaves and produces small, spike-like inflorescences. Its flowers are usually greenish or pale yellow, and it is often found in temperate regions. Urelytrum agropyroides plays a role in stabilizing soils and supporting local insect populations.
